TopicTitle: Unable to save, launch or start a new campaign

Articles.Content:
I guess these are all related as they appeared around the same time.

  • Clicking Launch in VAB does nothing.
  • No autosaves, quick saves or manual saves are stored.
  • Starting a new campaign doesn't proceed from filling in the names, colours etc.
  • Saving workspace designs DOES work.

Checking game files integrity (Steam) didn't find anything.

Re-install didn't have an effect.

Removing "Kerbal Space Program 2" in AppData/..../ seems to have resolved the problem.

System:

  • CPU: AMD Ryzen 7 5800X
  • Mem: 32GB
  • GPU: GeForce RTX 3080 10GB
  • Monitor: Samsung G9, native resolution 5120x1440

If attachments had been allowed here (as suggested elsewhere), I would have attached a zip with the whole KSP2 folder from AppData. Inside there is also a log file from game directory, from a previous save attempt. Let me know if I can drop it somewhere.

I hope you nail this one, it's a pretty sad method for recovering.

Edited March 5, 2023 by Margoth

Same issue here, I am unable to save any new files, quick-save, or quick-load.

I am able to save new workspaces in VAB, I just cant save the game itself.  and I am able to load previous saves. But nothing new at all.
